txt.en: 'Many are the grievances suffered by my family at the hands of the Orcs!'
'My grandfather Thormar was wounded at Azanulbizar, and walked with a limp ever after!'
'The Greyhammers would have great fortunes if it weren't for vile Orcs!'
'The Orcs are to blame for every hurt that ever befell a Greyhammer!'
'Never cross an Orc and let him live, or he'll make you regret it!'
'That no-good vermin, the Orc Bolg, placed a curse on my father Tandri!'
'My brother Rósar is a good Greyhammer. He has slain many Orcs!'
'The only Greyhammer who hates Orcs more than I do is my brother Stígur.'
'Have you seen my brother Otri? He is probably out slaying filthy Orcs!'
'Have I told you about the grievances my family have against the Orcs?'
